SOUTH AFRICAN ANTIAIRCRAFT UNIT IN ANGOLA, FIGHTING ON THE SIDE OF THE ANTICOMMUNIST NATIONAL UNION FOR THE TOTAL INDEPENDENCE OF ANGOLA (UNITA) DURING THE ANGOLAN CIVIL WAR, CIRCA 1980

content.question: Which of the following developments or processes in the late twentieth century best explains the participation of foreign troops in the Angolan Civil War, as shown in the two photographs?

choices.label: The creation of the Non-Aligned Movement
The proliferation of Cold War proxy conflicts
The global campaign against apartheid in South Africa
The emergence of ideologically driven movements advocating violence against civilians

content.answer: The proliferation of Cold War proxy conflicts

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
